static tx_oop_Tca_Table::getInstance ( $  extKey,
$  name 
) [static]

Gets an instance of a TCA table.

If the specified instance does not exist, this method will create it, and then return it.

Parameters:
string The extension key
string The short name name of the table (will be prepended with the extension key, in accordance to the TYPO3 coding guidelines)
Returns:
tx_oop_Tca_Table The instance of the TCA table
